title: Sansera bags BMW Motorrad's Rs 300-crore order
description: The order will be a validation of the company's ability to manufacture small aluminium forged components and will likely help it win more high-value orders from other marquee global customers. Besides, supply of high-margin aluminium forged components will add to its profitability. The company announced the order win in a stock exchange filing on Friday.
